title: In a rehearsal room
creator_credit: David W. Hahn and Otter Productions
brief_description: In Paris, at the turn of the century, two young dancers meet in a rehearsal room. Warming up, each is very aware of the other. Tentatively they come together and then, caught up in the music, they dance. A blend of ballet, music and romance.
